attributes.action: Calls for George Osborne to step down.
attributes.additional_details:
It's time that we as a country made our feelings heard.
George Osbourne is bringing this country too it's knees with his austerity plans. It took years for us as a country to gain the debts that we have and he is trying to cure the problems all at once. The only people who suffer in this are the low paid and those on benefits. we need him to resign now before we have more homeless people, deaths from people not being able to heat their homes and children starving.
PLEASE SIGN NOW.
